languages.text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, which allows them to sacrifice <u>(from 3 to 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to immediately teleport to any cell in a 4-cell radius.
languages.original_text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — поборник
Носитель плаща получает {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g}, позволяющую пожертвовать <u>(от 3 до 9)</u> пунктами {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, чтобы немедленно телепортироваться в любую ячейку на расстоянии до 4 клеток.

traits.locale_text:
Requires: Hereticus — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a psychic power {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} and may sacrifice 3–9 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wounds{/g} to immediately teleport on any cell in a 4-cell radius.

Requires Hereticus — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a psychic power, which allows them to sacrifice 3–9 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to immediately teleport to any cell in a 4-cell radius.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, which allows them to sacrifice <u>(from 3 to 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to immediately teleport to any cell in a 4-cell radius.

Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, which allows them to sacrifice <u>(from 3 to 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to immediately teleport to any cell in a 4-cell radius.

languages.text:
Требуется: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — поборник
Носитель плаща получает {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g}, позволяющую пожертвовать <u>(от 3 до 9)</u> пунктами {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, чтобы немедленно телепортироваться в любую ячейку на расстоянии до 4 клеток.

需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——信奉者
此斗篷的装备者获得{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}，可以消耗<u>3-9</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，立刻传送至4格内的任意格子处。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, which allows them to sacrifice <u>(from 3 to 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to immediately teleport to any cell in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
需要信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——信奉者
此斗篷的装备者获得{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}，可以消耗<u>3-9</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，立刻传送至4格内的任意格子处。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 信奉者が必要
このクロークを着用する者は{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を得ることで、<u>3～9</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を犠牲にして、4セル範囲内の任意のセルに即座にテレポートすることができる。
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, which allows them to sacrifice <u>(from 3 to 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to immediately teleport to any cell in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
異端者 ― 信奉者が必要
このマントを着用する者は超能力を得ることで、3～9の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を犠牲にして、4セル範囲内の任意のセルに即座にテレポートすることができる。

languages.text:
Requiere {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Devoto
El portador de esta capa obtiene un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} que le permite sacrificar <u>(de 3 a 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} para teletransportarse inmediatamente a cualquier casilla en un radio de 4 casillas.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, which allows them to sacrifice <u>(from 3 to 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to immediately teleport to any cell in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
Requiere Hereticus: Devoto
El portador de esta capa obtiene un poder psíquico que le permite sacrificar 3–9 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} para teletransportarse inmediatamente a cualquier casilla en un radio de 4 casillas.

languages.text:
Erfordert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} — Geweihter
Der Träger dieses Umhangs erhält eine {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g}, die ihm ermöglicht, <u>(3 bis 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu opfern, um sich innerhalb eines Radius von 4 Feldern sofort auf ein beliebiges Feld zu teleportieren.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, which allows them to sacrifice <u>(from 3 to 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to immediately teleport to any cell in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
Erfordert Haereticus — Geweihter
Der Träger dieses Umhangs erhält eine psionische Kraft, die es ihm ermöglicht, 3-9 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu opfern, um sich innerhalb eines 4-Felder-Radius augenblicklich auf ein beliebiges Feld zu teleportieren.

languages.text:
Requiert {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Disciple.
L'utilisateur de cette cape obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} qui lui permet de sacrifier <u>(entre 3 et 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de sa réserve pour se téléporter instantanément vers n'importe quelle case dans un rayon de 4 cases.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, which allows them to sacrifice <u>(from 3 to 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to immediately teleport to any cell in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
Requiert Hereticus — Disciple.
L'utilisateur de cette cape acquiert un pouvoir psychique qui lui permet de sacrifier 3 à 9 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de sa réserve pour se téléporter instantanément vers n'importe quelle case dans un rayon de 4 cases.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Kâfirce{/g} — Coşkulu kanaati gerektirir
Bu pelerini takan kişi, <u>(3 ila 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını feda ederek 4 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki herhangi bir hücreye anında ışınlanabilmesini sağlayan bir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Votary
The wearer of this cloak gains a {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g}, which allows them to sacrifice <u>(from 3 to 9)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to immediately teleport to any cell in a 4-cell radius.
